title: Full Service with Complete Strip of parts and rebuild
description: Includes all services. All parts are quoted separately

title: Full Service without strip
description: Full service - everything in the bike except full strip of parts. Additional part replacement is quoted separately

title: Drivetrain Tuning
description: Groupset tuning for both front and rear shifter and derailleur

title: Brake Cable Replacement
description: Replace and install new cables. All parts and cables are quoted separately

title: Drivetrain Gear Cable replacement
description: Replace and install new gear cables. All parts/cables are quoted separately
